text: Wílmar Enrique Barrios Terán (born 16 October 1993) is a Colombian professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Russian club Zenit Saint Petersburg. ==Club career== Barrios was given a red card for two bookable offences during the second leg of the 2018 Copa Libertadores Finals against rivals River Plate held at the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium. On 1 February 2019, he signed a 4.5-year contract with FC Zenit Saint Petersburg. ==International career== Barrios was named in Colombia's provisional squad for Copa América Centenario, but was cut from the final squad. In May 2018, he was named in Colombia's final 23-man squad for the 2018 World Cup in Russia. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |colspan="3"|Colombia |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2016||3||0 |- |2017||5||0 |- |2018||9||0 |- |2019||12||0 |- |2020||2||0 |- !Total||31||0 |} ==Honours== Deportes Tolima *Copa Colombia: 2014 Boca Juniors *Argentine Primera División: 2016–17 *Argentine Primera División: 2017–18 Zenit Saint Petersburg *Russian Premier League: 2018–19, 2019–20 *Russian Cup: 2019–20 *Russian Super Cup: 2020 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Cartagena, Colombia Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombia international footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Deportes Tolima footballers Category:Boca Juniors footballers Category:FC Zenit Saint Petersburg players Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Argentina Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Argentina Category:Footballers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic footballers of Colombia Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:2019 Copa América players Category:Colombian people of African descent
title: Wílmar Barrios
